title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Biel/Bienne, Switzerland
content:
Photo submitted by Tristan Monnier, “No more snow, let’s go for a XC ride to enjoy the not so rainy day. Biel/Bienne, Switzerland.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day.
